name: Star Snippets – Rich Snippet Vote
author: 1sr

sections.description:
Provides rich snippet rating/voting functionality for every content of a page.

You can customize size, orientation and colors of the rating/voting.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the entire star-snippets folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. DO NOT change the name of the star-snippets folder
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Navigate to Settings > Star snippets customize and save them.
  5. Place your snippet e.g.{star-snippet} in your content (posts, pages)
sections.faq:
Are there any questions?

Not at the moment.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial Release

1.1

  • Options for rating integration

1.2

  • Some description changes

1.3

  • Timeout configuration added for star snippet requests
